plan_context.query: Write a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are. It should be one paragraph and in the style of lecture notes.and write it onto a notion page called quantum

steps.task: Search for information on how fast quantum computers currently are to provide background for a lecture notes styled summary, using the exact query details.
Write a short note in one paragraph and in the style of lecture notes on how fast quantum computers currently are using the information provided by the search results.

inputs.name: $qc_speed_info
inputs.description: Search results containing information on the current speed of quantum computers

steps.task: Create a new page on Notion with the name 'quantum' and add a first paragraph comprising the note about the current speed of quantum computers as provided.

inputs.name: $note_content
inputs.description: The generated note on how fast quantum computers currently are in lecture notes style
